snippet: Although projections suggest that the costs of installing solar energy may outweigh the benefits in the near term, a report recommends that New York State embrace the technology.
abstract: Although projections suggest that the costs of installing solar energy may outweigh the benefits in the near term, a report recommends that New York State embrace the technology.
lead_paragraph: Despite uncertainties in the solar energy market, New York officials should support the "steady and measured growth" of solar power in the state as part of a balanced renewable energy strategy, a new report recommends.
